!help.content: Commands available (does not reflect permissions, you can see things you can't run):

sb!toggle.help: Use this to turn ShoulderBird pings on and off.

sb!show.help: Shows you what ShoulderBird is looking for. This is a regEx expression.

sb!set.help:
Allows you to set a ShoulderBird search.
sb!set {guildname} {regEx Expression}

sb!remove.help: Deletes your ShoulderBird search for provided guild.

!bye.help: This action can only ever be run by OWNER .env ID. See ReadMe

e!command.help: This will create a command or update an existing command. See ReadMe

d!command.help: This will delete a command, no confirmation

s!command.help: This will show a command. Good for copy/pasting a new edit

!help.help: This will list all commands in a guild
